billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Prohibits the use of an employee's or prospective employee's consumer credit report in making employment decisions
summary: Prohibits the use of an employee's or prospective employee's consumer credit report in making employment decisions, except in certain job related instances.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the general business law, in relation to prohibiting discrimination in employment decisions based on consumer credit reports
